dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5479 IH: To amend title 10, United States Code, to give the Secretary of Defense authority to build capacity of foreign security forces with respect to certain fishing operations.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Graves of Louisiana (for himself and Mr. Huffman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to give the Secretary of Defense authority to build capacity of foreign security forces with respect to certain fishing operations.

section.header: Authority to build capacity of foreign security forces
section.text: Section 333(a) of title 10, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

paragraph.text: Counter-illegal, unreported, and unregulated fishing operations.
